item.title: [PI] Slotmachine
item.dc:creator: @audioscape audioscape
item.description:
@audioscape wrote:

I am realesing 1 gambling game from my server called “CasinoScape” that has 4 gambling games.
Add this to commands.java

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("slots")){ int hasitem = 500000; int slot = (Misc.random(100)); int risked = (hasitem * 30); if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, hasitem)) { c.sendMessage("You havent got above "+hasitem+" gp in your inventory."); return; } if (slot == 11 || slot == 22 || slot == 33 || slot == 44 || slot == 55 || slot == 66 || slot == 77 || slot == 88 || slot == 99) { c.sendMessage("You pulled slotmachine and got "+slot+" You won "+(risked/1000000)+"M."); c.getItems().addItem(995, risked); } else { c.sendMessage("You pulled slotmachine and got "+slot+" You lost 500k."); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), hasitem); } }

Read full topic
